title: Full-Stack Developer
details: Three year old startup that assists entrepreneurs in achieving their goals through assistance in product development and business strategy. Developed the android application for Victor, a mobile tool for veterans. Used react-native and redux for the application, and ruby on rails for the backend. In addition, developed internal product platform that allows non-technical users to interface with developers in a more efficient manner. Used react and redux for the web application, and ruby on rails for the backend.

title: Software Consultant
details: Assisted with the migration to a new applicant tracking system. Evaluated 15 different ATS’ for ease- of-use, functionality, flexibility, service record, and back-end design.

title: Procurement Intern
details: Responsible for auditing all University departments to update inventory of computer equipment. Served as a technology resource for each department.

title: Web Developer
details: Developed new website for firm selling branded flash drives. Modified firm’s CRM system to work with the new website and automatically generate sales reports. Built with HTML, CSS, and vanilla javascript.
